name: Moon Lander (itch) (nylecm)
description:
Moon Lander

This game is inspired by Lunar Lander. The objective is to land the lander as smooth as possible on the surface of the moon. Built using Unity Engine, art is my own work but the sounds are from bensound (music) and mixkit (rocket).

Features:

  • Multiple rocket ships with different characteristics.
  • Achievements & Power-ups
  • Multiple profiles.

Upcoming Features

  • Microtransactions, coins can be bought with real money, or even better, loot crates with random ships and levels for additional excitement.
  • More polish to level design, additional levels etc.
  • Colour graphics.
